title: Score Board
body:
I just open my score board. And it jump upside over how i can get it back ?
Thanks for every help

replies.body:
I'm not sure I understand the issue you're having with the scoreboard. Can you clarify or provide a screenshot? 

You can grab a screenshot in game by:

* Pressing F12
* Locating the screenshot inside C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Screenshots
